p: You care about keeping your budget, having control over the process and do a heck of a delivery. I'm able to help you with that.
I offer a straight forward approach to developing software that takes the guesswork out of the equation.
- Giving you more control of the progress and a headache-free delivery.
Qamcom is a world-class expert in signal processing who work in applications ranging from Communication Technology to Autonomous Drive.
Qamcom employees are PhD's or industry veterans and require high precision and quality from their consultants.
Bobby makes the web, and the brands that populate it, beautiful and cool by helping them tell their unique stories in a way that captivates their visitors.
Bobby thrives by being unique. They practice discipline in their craft and the results they achieve are astonishing!
I offer fullstack development front-to-end and am able to help you take on projects at any stage from ideation to delivery.
I specialise in VR- and AR-technologies and deliver high-end gameplay interaction expertise
bullet: Gameplay Interaction and Real World simulations

sections.title: Contact
sections.ingress: Ready to take a step further in our relationship? Come on, now, don't be shy - we're a happy bunch and we'd love to hear from you! Pick your favorite channel from below and see you soon.
